articles.author: Cathy Owen
articles.title: Air Force One flies over Wales as President Joe Biden arrives in Cornwall for G7 Summit - Wales Online
articles.description: It is the American President's first overseas visit as he arrived in Newquay for the G7 Summit
articles.content:
Air Force One was spotted flying over Wales as Joe Biden arrived for his first overseas visit since becoming US President.
The plane carrying Mr Biden and his wife Jill was seen on the radar flying … [+3769 chars]

articles.title: COVID-19 | India reports record single-day deaths as Bihar revises tally after HC-ordered audit - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: 6,148 deaths in a day is the highest number of  COVID-19 fatalities reported in 24 hours in any country, so far, in the pandemic. The United States of America had reported 5,444 daily COVID-19 deaths, a previous global record, on February 12.
articles.content:
India on June 10 reported record 6,148 COVID-19 deaths, a sudden jump from 2,219 deaths reported a day before on June 9, according to the Union Ministry of Health and Family Welfare.
This is the hig… [+2183 chars]

articles.title: Covid Updates: Latin America Is Among Regions Most in Need of Vaccines, W.H.O. Says - The New York Times
articles.description: President Biden could announce a plan to distribute 500 million Pfizer-BioNTech doses as early as Thursday. A man has been charged in the theft of hundreds of blank vaccination cards in Los Angeles.
